maharagama sita pambaahinna bala dhawanaya wu langama bas rathaya 137 kilomitar kanuwa asaladi wanguwak ganimedi perali gos atha.sabaragamu wishwawidyalayata pamini sisun pirisakda thuwalakaruwan athara sitithi.riyaduru harunu wita anek ayata barapathala thuwala sidu wi nathayi oopanayaka polisiye ratha wahana anshaye sthanadhipathi chamli palihena mahatha pawasiya.anathura siduwena awasthawedi bas rathaya thula magin 61 denaku siti bawada palihena mahatha kiya.udasana 6 yi pahata maharagamin pitath wu bas rathaya udasana 9.35 pamana wana wita madolata langa wi thibina.

deshagunika wiparyasaya (anathurudayaka mattamin), muhudu mattama ihalayama (me siyawasathula mitar gananakin wiya haka ), sagara aamlikaranaya, hayawana maha jiwa wandawime thathwaya(parisarika jiwa aadharaka paddhathi bindawatemin thibima ),bora thel ha anekuth sampath nishpadanaya mudunatama pamina thibima,panshu khadanaya, pirisidu jala mulashra ahimi wima,wana winashaya, mathsya sampatha sigra lesa pahatha watima, minis prajawe itha wishala pirisak goduru wi athi duppathkama ha asamanathawaya (paratharaya sigrayen wadiwemin thibima ) ha loka aarthika arbudaya, ihatha ki goliya arbudayangen samaharaki.
